alert.note: Alert for Ventura (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 7:58AM PDT until March 16 at 9:41AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Areas near the Conejo Creek, around the city of Camarillo in Ventura County. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...A few feet of standing water continues to flood roads near the creek, including Adohr Lane and Ridge View Street. Some portions of Leisure Village closest to the creek may still be experiencing flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 747 AM PDT, rain has drastically weakened over the area, but runoff from earlier rains will continue. The Conejo Creek stream gauge peaked an hour ago and is lowering, but was still 1 foot above flood stage. The creek will continue to lower, but flooding from the earlier rise may linger for a few more hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Camarillo. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
